item.title: Added Push Notification & Install as App
item.author: invalid@example.com (wmnitin)
item.dc:creator: wmnitin
item.content:encoded:
New Features Added:
  • Installable App
  • Push Notifications
  • More Mobile Friendly
Summary:
As majority of our forum members use mobile device & in order to provide seamless user experience we have added these features.

You can install this DJ Forum as app on desktop & mobile, while opening our forum, you will see install button.
You can subscribe to push notifications for all alerts, replies, reactions to your content, you can subscribe any topic on our forum...

Added Push Notification & Install as App

item.title: Read it before posting any trick
item.author: invalid@example.com (wmnitin)
item.dc:creator: wmnitin
item.content:encoded:
Rules in short:
  • Post any Internet trick, even you can post old trick but trick should not be already posted in this forum.
  • You can post unconfirmed tricks too.
  • Use sub forums like Airtel, Vodafone etc for any trick or help.
  • Fully copied content is not allowed. You can change it according to your language to make it un copied.
Not Following these rules may Lead to Ban

item.title: Read Rules (Avoid Ban)
item.author: invalid@example.com (wmnitin)
item.dc:creator: wmnitin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Digital Janta forum.

Thread Posting Rules:
  1. Only English is allowed, If you use any Other Language, then we have power to delete your message without any Notice. (You can use any language in shoutbox)
  2. Referral links are allowed but you have to post non referral links too in same thread.
  3. Copy Paste is not allowed !
  4. No SPAM threads, Replies, Advertisement, Abusive language ,off-topic will be accepted in any case !
  5. Cr@ck, H@ck...
Read Rules (Avoid Ban)
